text: Volga-Volga () is a 1938 Soviet comedy movie directed by Grigori Aleksandrov."Лубок эпохи". Нераскрытый секрет успеха фильма "Волга-Волга" It stars Igor Ilyinsky, Lyubov Orlova, and Vladimir Volodin. == Actors == *Igor Ilyinsky - Ivan Byvalov *Lyubov Orlova - Dunya Petrova *Vladimir Volodin - old pilot *Pavel Olenev - Kuzma Ivanovich *Andrey Tutyshkin - Alyoha Trubyshkin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Aleksandrov
title: Volga-Volga
